Steinance

Stein Kretsinger has put $1000 in matching funds towards the 2015 campaign. He scored a beast of a desk - local walnut (harvested from Dr. Kretsinger's back yard), recycled honduran and fijian mahogany top, maple sides with walnut dowel pegs...

Amount:
